players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafia. We need to vote him out today."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I investigated her last night and she's mafia. We should vote her out."
Bob: "Diana is clearly trying to frame me. I'm the detective and she's mafia. Vote Diana."
You: "I believe Diana. Bob is the mafia."
Diana: "Alice, we must vote Bob out. He is the only one who could be mafia since Charlie is dead and I investigated Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
